name: Farhana Kabir
comments: Very professional easy to communicate with. The excel file with the material was clear, easy to read, incredibly useful and Professional.

name: Rupom Ahmed
comments: Excellent communication, beautiful work, and quick revisions. She is very kind and very professional. Thanks so much. Highly recommend.

name: Asad Mahmud
comments: Mahadi Hasan was very responsive and delivered work up to expectations quickly and efficiently, able to adapt work based on customer feedback promptly!

name: Rizvi Islam
comments: I think this was a nice project to do together. Fast and accurate. Detailed. She built it from scratch from my simple drawing to a full 3D. Thanks.
